name: The 10 Souls
description:
I made a game so people can break and speedrun it

I made a game and I have no clue what to do with it.

Me and a friend of mine started this project and I ended up doing 99% of the work.

I never fought of really sharing it but here I am.

The game is mend for speedrun purposes I guess.

It's for pc and the goal of the game will be clear once you play it.

Have fun and maybe share your time? idk.
